Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nichols Advantage Aldosterone Assay, a competitive immunochemiluminometric assay for quantitative measurement of aldosterone in serum, EDTA plasma, and extracted urine
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic laboratory use with Nichols Advantage Specialty System for quantitative measurement of aldosterone in human serum, EDTA plasma, and extracted urine to aid in diagnosis and treatment of primary aldosteronism, hypertension, selective hypoaldosteronism, edematous states, and other electrolyte imbalance conditions
